meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lopsided.
meanings.sent1: The lopsidedness of the cake made it difficult to frost evenly.
meanings.sent2: The tree's lopsidedness was due to strong winds blowing from one side.
meanings.sent3: The lopsidedness of the clown's hat added to his comedic appearance.
meanings.sent4: The lopsidedness of the seesaw symbolized the uneven distribution of weight.
meanings.sent5: The lopsidedness of the painting drew attention to the artist's unique style.

meanings.definition: An imbalance or asymmetry in shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The lopsidedness of the table caused the drinks to spill.
meanings.sent2: The lopsidedness of the building's design made it stand out in the cityscape.
meanings.sent3: The lopsidedness of the sandwich made it challenging to eat without making a mess.
meanings.sent4: The lopsidedness of the mountain range created a stunning silhouette against the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The lopsidedness of the sculpture added an intriguing element to the art exhibition.
